title: I need help to transfer my account From NA to EUNE :'(
body:
Hello guys here is my story <3 

I started play that game a long time ago i am from E.U but when i start this game the only server was the N.A server so i was playing there for a long time back then the ping was only 90/120 so it was kinda easy to play!
So because i learn to play on N.A i stay on N.A server but years have passed and the ping now is at 290 {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} ....so you cant play any more

My problem here is that i have my account on N.A locked on this server because i cant transfer them because they cost 20$ but wait my problem is not the how much they cost (i mean it is but) my real problem is that the currency is dollars and my only method to buy RP is by paysafe card!
So i ask a rioter one day and tell him how i can i buy RP with paysafe cards from E.U for the N.A server and he told that i cant do that because my currency is EURO and i cant use a store with dollars....Which make sense!

So now i have my account  "locked" on N.A server and not be able to transfer on E.U server and be able to play it :/

And my Question here is why the transfer cost money? i mean i can understand that people from the E.U servers may transfer again and again from E.UNE to E.UW and the opposite but even in that case who would want to lose all his ranks just to transfer again and again to other server?

And i mean someone from N.A or someone from E.U this kind of transfer wouldnt be spammed simple because you will have to be crazy to transfer your self into a server with 250 ping more than your current one :P

So riot can we make the transfer from N.A to E.U free? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Riot need to make the transfer for free because as this dude or gal say its not about the money its that some times you dont have an option to actually buy RP i believe that a rioter need to come here and help him out

you can pay with paypal, on na. 
paypal will automatically convert your currency.
If i had one .. and i cant just pay 20 euros for a transfer like its nothing..i mean its just a {{summoner:12}}  ..
